COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow unmapped fields in MultiClustersIT tests (#120873) The message_id field may be unmapped if documents were indexed into some indices but not all. This change specifies the unmapped type for message_id, allowing it to be sorted in such cases. Closes #120796
